refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: g_shoveNoZ enables or disables supression of Z-axis shoving. When enabled, shoving in the vertical up/down direction is supressed, and typically meant to help reduce shove-boosting and other tactics when they are undesired.

para.note: must be enabled for this variable to take effect.
para.warning: Disabling this feature can greatly alter gameplay, as it allows new and unexpected ways of winning objectives.
